definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.chinese: 他说的话需要调查核实。

sentences.english: Reports to the hotline will be investigated by the city's health authorities.
sentences.chinese: 举报内容将由北京市卫生部门调查核实。

sentences.english: Any other doubtful transaction, which it is reasonable to think that it is necessary to investigate and verify.
sentences.chinese: 七其他有合理理由认为需要调查核实的可疑交易活动。

to investigate and find out/to ascertain
to file for investigation/to prosecute (a case)
investigation/inquiry/to investigate/to survey/survey/(opinion) poll/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to transfer (a case, a person, files etc)
to find out/to ascertain/to get to the bottom of/to clarify
to register (to an official organism)/to file a case (for investigation)
to report to one's superiors/to appear in the news/to reply to a letter
